content.metaTitle: Villa Odon Jávea - €1.39M | 4 Bed Luxury Villa | Costa Blanca
content.metaDescription: Discover Villa Odon: stunning 4-bedroom villa in Jávea's prestigious Monte Olimpo. 1000m² plot, sea views, 8 minutes to beach. Ready to move in. €1,390,000.
content.heroIntro:
Nestled in the prestigious Monte Olimpo urbanization of Jávea, Villa Odon represents the epitome of Mediterranean luxury living. This exceptional 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom villa combines contemporary design with timeless elegance, set on a generous 1,000m² plot just 8 minutes from the pristine beaches of the Costa Blanca.

With its striking two-floor design and expansive terraces offering breathtaking views of the sea, mountains, and landscaped gardens, Villa Odon is more than just a home – it's a lifestyle statement. The property's prime location in Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar places you at the heart of one of Spain's most coveted coastal destinations, where year-round sunshine and sophisticated living converge.

locationSection.intro:
Jávea stands as one of the Costa Blanca's most prestigious destinations, where dramatic clifftop locations meet crystal-clear Mediterranean waters. The Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area represents the pinnacle of coastal living, offering residents an exclusive retreat just minutes from vibrant town centers and world-class beaches. This sought-after location combines the tranquility of elevated residential living with convenient access to Jávea's renowned restaurants, boutique shopping, and recreational facilities.

The Monte Olimpo urbanization epitomizes luxury coastal development, featuring premium properties with established infrastructure and a strong community of international residents. With easy access to both Jávea's historic old town and the cosmopolitan Arenal beach area, this location offers the perfect balance of privacy and connectivity, making it ideal for both permanent residence and holiday home investment.
highlights: Just 8 minutes drive to Jávea's pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters
Located in the exclusive Monte Olimpo urbanization with premium amenities
Easy access to Jávea's historic old town with traditional markets and restaurants
Close proximity to world-class golf courses and yacht marinas
Excellent connectivity to Alicante Airport (90 minutes) and Valencia Airport (75 minutes)

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Odon showcases exceptional attention to detail throughout its 160m² of thoughtfully designed living space. The property's open-concept layout maximizes natural light and creates seamless indoor-outdoor living, while premium finishes and modern amenities ensure contemporary comfort in this Mediterranean paradise.
features: Spacious open-concept living, dining and kitchen area with premium finishes
Four generous bedrooms including two master suites with private terraces
Three modern bathrooms with high-quality fixtures and fittings
Large windows throughout maximizing natural light and panoramic views
Multiple outdoor terraces perfect for entertaining and relaxation
Private swimming pool set within beautifully landscaped gardens
Fully equipped modern kitchen with integrated appliances
Fitted wardrobes in all bedrooms providing ample storage
Ready-to-move-in condition with complete turnkey finish
Low-maintenance design ideal for lock-up-and-leave convenience

content.investmentSection:
The Costa Blanca property market continues to demonstrate remarkable resilience and growth, with Jávea consistently ranking among the most desirable locations for international property investment. Villa Odon's position in the prestigious Monte Olimpo development, combined with its proximity to beaches and amenities, positions it perfectly to benefit from the region's strong rental yields and capital appreciation potential.

Spain's Golden Visa program, favorable tax treaties, and the growing trend of remote working have significantly increased demand for premium properties like Villa Odon. With its turnkey condition and prime location just minutes from the sea, this property offers exceptional potential for both personal enjoyment and rental income generation, making it an ideal addition to any international property portfolio.
whyBuySection: Prime location in prestigious Monte Olimpo urbanization with established infrastructure
Ready-to-move-in condition with complete turnkey finish and premium specifications
Strong rental potential in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after destinations
Just 8 minutes from pristine beaches and world-class marina facilities
Spacious 1,000m² plot offering privacy and potential for further enhancement
Excellent connectivity to international airports and major Spanish cities
Low-maintenance design perfect for holiday home or permanent residence

faqs.question: What is the total price and are there any additional costs?
faqs.answer: Villa Odon is priced at €1,390,000. Additional costs typically include 10% IVA (VAT), legal fees (approximately 1%), notary fees, and registration costs. We can provide a detailed breakdown of all associated costs upon request.

faqs.question: What makes this location in Jávea special?
faqs.answer: The property is located in the exclusive Monte Olimpo urbanization, just 8 minutes from Jávea's beaches. This area offers stunning sea and mountain views, established infrastructure, and easy access to restaurants, golf courses, and marinas while maintaining privacy and tranquility.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international purchasers?
faqs.answer: The process involves obtaining an NIE number, signing a private contract with deposit (typically 10%), arranging mortgage if required, completing due diligence, and final signing before a notary. We guide clients through each step and can recommend trusted legal professionals.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno, specialist mortgage brokers for international buyers in Spain. Spanish banks typically lend up to 70% for non-residents. You can start your mortgage application through our dedicated link for personalized assistance.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Jávea is one of Costa Blanca's premier rental destinations. Properties in Monte Olimpo typically achieve strong rental yields, especially during peak season (June-September). The turnkey condition and prime location make it ideal for luxury holiday rentals.

faqs.question: When can the property be completed and handed over?
faqs.answer: Villa Odon is ready for immediate handover upon completion of the purchase process. The property is finished to a turnkey standard with all fixtures, fittings, and landscaping complete, allowing you to move in immediately.

faqs.question: What is included in the sale price?
faqs.answer: The price includes the fully finished villa, landscaped gardens, swimming pool, fitted kitchen with appliances, fitted wardrobes, all fixtures and fittings, and air conditioning throughout. The property is sold fully equipped and ready to move in.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa Odon?
faqs.answer: We can arrange viewings at your convenience, either in person or via video tour. Contact us on +34 634 044 970 or WhatsApp to schedule your visit. We also offer virtual viewings for international clients who cannot travel immediately.

content.conclusion: Villa Odon represents an exceptional opportunity to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise in one of Spain's most prestigious coastal locations. With its perfect combination of luxury, location, and lifestyle, this turnkey property offers everything you need to start enjoying the Costa Blanca dream immediately. Contact us today on +34 634 044 970 or via WhatsApp to arrange your viewing and take the first step toward owning this magnificent villa in Jávea's exclusive Monte Olimpo.
